title: User Registration with Valid Details
description: Verify that a new student can register successfully with valid input data and receives a 201 response with correct payload.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with valid name, email, password, department, semester, and CGPA
Verify response status is 201 Created
Verify response body confirms successful registration

title: User Registration with Missing Required Fields
description: Verify registration fails with 400 error when required fields are missing in the request payload.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/register with missing 'email' and 'password' fields
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request
Verify error message clearly indicates missing required fields

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Check that a registered user can authenticate with valid email and password and receives a JWT token with correct scopes.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with valid email and password
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response contains a valid JWT token including role claims

title: User Login with Invalid Credentials
description: Check that login fails with 401 Unauthorized error when incorrect credentials are provided.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/auth/login with invalid email or password
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized
Verify error message indicates invalid credentials

title: Fetch Authenticated User Profile
description: Verify that an authenticated user can fetch their profile data successfully with a valid JWT.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/auth/profile with valid Authorization Bearer token
Verify response status is 200 OK
Verify response payload contains correct user profile data

title: Fetch Authenticated Profile with Invalid or Expired Token
description: Ensure request to fetch profile with invalid or expired JWT returns 401 Unauthorized.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/auth/profile with expired or malformed token
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: CRUD Operations on Student Profile
description: Validate that students can create, retrieve, update, and delete their profiles with appropriate authorization and validation.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/students to create profile
Verify profile created with 201 status
Send GET request to /api/students/{id} to retrieve profile
Verify profile data matches created data
Send PUT request to /api/students/{id} to update profile fields with valid changes
Verify updated profile data is returned and saved
Send DELETE request to /api/students/{id} as an admin user to delete the profile
Verify response status is 204 No Content and student profile is deleted

title: Resume Upload with Valid PDF
description: Ensure students can upload resume files securely and server returns a 201 status on success.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/resume with valid PDF file and authorization token
Verify response status is 201 Created

title: Resume Upload Rejects Invalid File Types
description: Verify that uploading non-PDF file formats returns appropriate error code and message.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/resume with a non-PDF file type
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request

title: Secure Resume PDF Streaming Access
description: Verify that authorized users can stream the resume PDF securely, while unauthorized users receive 403 Forbidden.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/resumes/{studentId} with valid Authorization token
Verify response status is 200 OK and content-type is application/pdf
Send GET request to /api/resumes/{studentId} without valid Authorization or invalid token
Verify response status is 403 Forbidden

title: Share Resume via Expiring Link
description: Test if authenticated users can generate expiring shareable links for resumes successfully.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/resume-management/share with valid JWT
Verify response status is 200 OK and a valid expiring URL is returned

title: Internship Creation by Authorized Roles
description: Verify that only admin and recruiter roles can create internship postings successfully.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/internships with valid internship data as admin user
Verify response status is 201 Created
Send POST request to /api/internships as student role
Verify response status is 403 Forbidden

title: Internship Listing with Multi-Criteria Filters
description: Verify that internships can be retrieved filtered by department and skills via query parameters.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/internships?department=Computer Science&skills=JavaScript
Verify response status is 200 OK and returned internships match filter criteria
Verify no internships outside specified department or skills are included

title: Student Application Submission Validations
description: Check application submission fails with 400 validation errors when required fields are missing or invalid.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/applications with empty or incomplete cover letter
Verify response status is 400 Bad Request
Verify error message indicates invalid or missing fields

title: Real-time Application Status Tracking
description: Verify that students can retrieve their application status with correct visual indicators.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/applications filtered by student with valid JWT
Verify returned applications include current status fields with correct values
Verify status visual indicators align with application data

title: Mentor Application Review and Feedback Workflow
description: Check mentors can bulk approve or reject applications with feedback, which updates student-visible status correctly.

steps.description: Send PUT requests to /api/applications/{id}/status to update application status with feedback as mentor
Verify response status is 200 OK
Student fetches application status to confirm mentor feedback is visible
Verify feedback text and status updates are reflected correctly

title: Admin Internship Management Operations
description: Validate admin users can create, update, and delete internships with authorization enforced.

steps.description: Send POST to /api/internships as admin to create internship
Verify internship creation returns 201 Created
Send PUT to /api/internships/{id} as admin to update internship details
Verify update status is 200 OK
Send DELETE to /api/internships/{id} as admin to delete internship
Verify response status is 204 No Content

title: Recruiter Posting and Candidate Filtering
description: Verify recruiters can manage their internship postings and filter candidates as per criteria securely.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/internships/my-postings with recruiter JWT
Verify postings belong only to authenticated recruiter
Send candidate filter requests with skill and CGPA filters
Verify filtered candidate lists returned correctly

title: Analytics Data Access by Role
description: Ensure analytics API endpoints return correct data per user role and forbid unauthorized access.

steps.description: Send GET request to /api/analytics/dashboard as admin
Verify 200 OK with dashboard analytics data is returned
Send GET request to /api/analytics/student/{studentId} as the same student
Verify 200 OK with student-specific metrics
Send GET request to /api/analytics/student/{studentId} as unauthorized user
Verify 403 Forbidden is returned

title: Notification Scheduling and Dispatch
description: Test that authenticated users can schedule notifications, list them, and cancel them, and that background dispatch functions as expected.

steps.description: Send POST request to /api/notifications to schedule a notification with valid data
Verify response is 201 Created and notification is scheduled
Send GET request to /api/notifications to list all scheduled notifications
Verify returned notifications include the newly scheduled one
Send POST request to /api/notifications/{id}/cancel to cancel a scheduled notification
Verify response is 200 OK and notification is cancelled

title: Frontend Role-Based Route Protection and Responsiveness
description: Verify the React frontend displays appropriate dashboards based on user role and protects routes accordingly with responsive design and accessibility standards.

steps.description: Login as student, mentor, admin, and recruiter roles respectively
Verify visible dashboard elements match user role permissions
Attempt to access protected routes without login
Verify user is redirected to login page
Resize browser window and test UI layout on different screen sizes
Verify UI is responsive and accessible (ARIA roles, keyboard navigation)

title: JWT Token Verification Middleware
description: Ensure the authentication middleware correctly verifies JWT tokens on protected routes and rejects invalid or expired tokens.

steps.description: Send request to a protected API endpoint with a valid JWT
Verify request is authorized and response is successful
Send request with expired or malformed JWT token
Verify response status is 401 Unauthorized

title: Concurrency Handling on Application Status Updates
description: Test the system handles simultaneous status update requests on the same application without inconsistent states.

steps.description: Simultaneously send multiple PUT requests to /api/applications/{id}/status with different status updates
Verify system processes requests serially or manages concurrency without corrupting application state

title: API Error Codes and Messages Compliance
description: Verify all critical API endpoints return proper HTTP status codes and detailed error messages as per specification on failure scenarios.

steps.description: Invoke endpoints with invalid data or unauthorized access attempts
Verify appropriate HTTP status codes (400, 401, 403, 404) returned
Verify error messages are informative and conform to API documentation
